-e ---

𒌍 ušu₃ thirty 30 𒐈×𒌋 3×10 •eš₅u (eš₅ “three” * 𒌋 u “ten”

𒀭 𒌋𒌋𒌋 Sun ⇔ Sin ☾☾☾ moon ⇔ somnus (sleep)

𒀭 𒌋𒌋𒌋 Sun ⇔ 三 Sin : moon = san জোন zün լուսին lusin चन्द्र candra ⇔ somnus (sleep)

𒌙 ma.utu mouth / middle moon 𒌗 / month 𒌘 moon 𒌋𒌋 man min 𒌋𒌋𒌋

𒌋𒌋𒌋 many moons 𒈨𒌍 mes 𒆳 mat,mont,mount 𓈉

岁 suì suns year/years old/age (a measure word) 岁 山夕 shān xī

month 𒌍 MEŠ 𒌋𒌋𒌋 MAN 𒌋𒌋

Three weeks of ten days 𒌋𒌋𒌋 = month (as in China)

𒌋 week < bꜣktw 𓅡 𓎡 𓏏 𓏲 𓏥
